name: Sample Star
description:
Help guide the Sample Star through her routines to attract customers to the Cafe. Your combo increases as you get more correct routine moves in a row, if you miss one, your combo score will decrease. 

Go through 10 rounds and see how high your score can get!

Normal mode keeps the same growing pattern for the routine to copy, if you're feeling up for a challenge, Hard will give you a unique pattern each round.

Design: Lucy and Eric Rollins

Art: Lucy Rollins

Music: Moodswing by Podington Bear

under https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/

Theme of the game jam is: Cafe.

Arrow Keys to match the pattern.

Space to start next round after performance is graded.
